lemonade.title: The Lemonade Company
lemonade.scenario:
In this scenario, you are the director of a successful lemonade stand. You have 3 product definitions and multiple recipes for each product. 

After producing your lemonades, you have 3 kinds of packaging available to create end-user products. You have .33L can, 1L bottle and 20L barrel options. You of course employ a labor force (probably mom) for manufacturing. 

Load this scenario to check your expenses and product costs!

supplement.title: Mega Nutrition!
supplement.scenario: In this scenario, you run a supplement manufacturer! You'll have a variety of product definitions, ranging from protein powders to vitamin pills. Load this scenario now to see how that would work!
